title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Designing Online Collaborative Language Education Utilizing Digital Educational Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design language education content using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Drag&Fly platform) in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can continuously improve their instructional design competencies through formative assessment
Learners can apply pedagogical strategies for online collaborative learning (e.g., role division, feedback loops) to real educational scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
